title: Yakeato no, Okashi no Ki
synopsis: The fifth film in Shin-Ei's series of annual WWII themed anime television movies for children "Sensou Douwa" (war story).
related_anime: ['Kiku-chan to Ookami', 'Futatsu no Kurumi', 'Boku no Boukuugou', 'Tako ni Natta Okaasan', 'Umigame to Shounen', 'Chiisai Sensuikan ni Koi wo Shita Dekasugiru Kujira no Hanashi', 'Aoi Hitomi no Onnanoko no Ohanashi']
